section.heading: Payment of expenses incurred in proceedings for incorporation if village not incorporated

content.p:
ยง 2-236 Payment of expenses incurred in proceedings for incorporation
if village not incorporated. If the incorporation of the proposed
village be not effected by the proceedings authorized in this article,
the expenses incurred by the towns in which any part of such territory
is located for payment of cost of posting, publishing and serving
required notices, stenographic services and services of inspectors of
election shall be paid from the fund deposited with the department of
state, on behalf of the commission. If such fund so deposited is not
sufficient to pay all of such expenses, the costs in excess of such fund
shall be a general town charge.
